settings.title: Artisans Cooperative
settings.text: Artisans Cooperative is a “better” crafting online handmade marketplace, run as a values-aligned, member-owned cooperative.

settings.title: Authentically American
settings.text: In 2017, Dean Wegner created Authentically American® to help bring manufacturing jobs back to America by selling premium, competitively priced, apparel that is ALL Made in USA, no exceptions. They offer a 15% military discount via ID.me.

settings.title: Bone Frog Coffee
settings.text: Tim Cruickshank, founder of Bone frog Coffee, makes sure that their coffee beans are premium and sustainably sourced so that every sip is memorable. Receive a 10% military discount at checkout via GovX.

settings.title: Brotallion LLC
settings.text: Brotallion is a veteran-owned business, passionate about creating apparel, products, and content that invoke the human emotion of flight for aviators, by aviators.

settings.title: Grill Your Ass Off
settings.text: Jason Murff and his team at Grill Your Ass Off, have created great Texas made seasoning for all your grilling needs, that has been featured on Forbes, Fox Business and named Veteran Owned Small Business of the Year for 2022. A 20% military discount is available via GovX.

settings.title: InstaPrivy
settings.text: The InstaPrivy, is a super compact, lightweight and functional portable toilet and privacy shelter system, created by Paul Mangum.

settings.title: Pit Barrel Cooker
settings.text: Noah and Amber Glanville designed the Pit Barrel® to eliminate the guesswork and established a new paradigm in outdoor cooking. A 10% military discount is available on their website via GovX.

settings.title: Shell Shock CBD
settings.text: John Burk and his partner Joshua Sherrell, they made it their mission to make sure every CBD product they release would be affordable for everyone. They offer a 15% military discount.

settings.title: Triple Nikel
settings.text: Founded in 2020 with a mission to amplify stories through apparel and vibrant designs that are inspired by culture, music, community, history, and love. They offer a 10% discount to all current and former military and their dependents.

settings.title: Wicked Seven
settings.text: Owners Jessica and Jason Brown, design unique and creative drink coasters, and are passionate about creating high-quality pieces that fit their customers’ unique styles and personalities. A 10% military discount is available via GovX on their site.

settings.title: Wood Thingamajigs
settings.text: Jessica and Jason Brown handcraft high-quality wood home decor items, kitchen items, cornhole and more. They offer a 10% discount to all current and former U.S. military via GovX.
